Chrome.Notes:
1. Inspect the text element (this will open the devtools panel).
2. In the Styles pane, look for the section where the `color` property is set for the element.
3. Click on the color square next to the `color` property. This will open the color panel.
4. Expand the "Contrast Ratio" section to see more details whether the color value meets the W3C recommendation.
Chrome.Name: Find color contrast ratio

Firefox.Notes:
1. Inspect the text element (this will open the devtools panel).
2. In the pane next to the DOM tree, look for the section where the `color` property is set for the element.
3. Click on the color circle next to the `color` property. This will open the color panel.
Firefox.Name: Check the color contrast ratio of a text element
